Bash(python -c "
from openpyxl import load_workbook
import os

file_path = ''Weekly Tracker.xlsx''
print(f''File exists: {os.path.exists(file_path)}'')
print(f''File size: {os.path.getsize(file_path)} bytes'')
print(f''Last modified: {os.path.getmtime(file_path)}'')

wb = load_workbook(file_path)
print(f''\nSheets in workbook: {wb.sheetnames}'')

ws = wb[''Weekly Gallons 25'']
print(f''\nSheet max row: {ws.max_row}'')
print(f''Sheet max column: {ws.max_column}'')

print(''\nActual cell values:'')
for row in range(44, 49):
    a_val = ws[f''A{row}''].value
    b_val = ws[f''B{row}''].value
    e_val = ws[f''E{row}''].value
    h_val = ws[f''H{row}''].value
    k_val = ws[f''K{row}''].value
    print(f''Row {row}: A={repr(a_val)}, B={repr(b_val)}, E={repr(e_val)}, H={repr(h_val)}, K={repr(k_val)}'')
")

Bash(python -c "
from openpyxl import load_workbook

# Check the backup
wb = load_workbook(''backups/Weekly Tracker_2025-10-20.xlsx'')
ws = wb[''Weekly Gallons 25'']

print(''BACKUP file (before backfill):'')
for row in range(44, 49):
    a = ws[f''A{row}''].value
    b = ws[f''B{row}''].value
    e = ws[f''E{row}''].value
    print(f''Row {row}: Week={a}, Diesel={b}, Regular={e}'')
")

Bash(python -c "
from openpyxl import load_workbook

wb = load_workbook(''Weekly Tracker.xlsx'')
ws = wb[''Weekly Gallons 25'']

print(''\n'' + ''='' * 70)
print(''FINAL EXCEL DATA - ALL WEEKS'')
print(''='' * 70)
print(''\nWeek Ending  |   Diesel   |  Regular   |    DEF     |   Total'')
print(''-'' * 70)

for row in range(44, 49):
    week = ws[f''A{row}''].value
    diesel = ws[f''B{row}''].value or 0
    regular = ws[f''E{row}''].value or 0
    def_val = ws[f''H{row}''].value or 0
    total = ws[f''K{row}''].value or 0
    print(f''{week:12} | {diesel:10,.2f} | {regular:10,.2f} | {def_val:10,.2f} | {total:10,.2f}'')

print(''='' * 70)
print(''\n✓ All historical data successfully restored!'')
print(''✓ Formatting preserved from existing columns'')
print(''\nYou can now open the file in VS Code or Excel to view the data.'')
")

Bash(python -c "
from openpyxl import load_workbook

wb = load_workbook(''Weekly Tracker.xlsx'')
ws = wb[''Weekly Gallons 25'']

print(''Current formulas in row 43 (reference row):'')
print(f''D43: {ws[""D43""].value}'')
print(f''G43: {ws[""G43""].value}'')
print(f''J43: {ws[""J43""].value}'')
print(f''M43: {ws[""M43""].value}'')

print(''\nCurrent formulas in row 49 (Total row):'')
print(f''B49: {ws[""B49""].value}'')
print(f''E49: {ws[""E49""].value}'')
print(f''H49: {ws[""H49""].value}'')
print(f''K49: {ws[""K49""].value}'')
print(f''D49: {ws[""D49""].value}'')
print(f''G49: {ws[""G49""].value}'')
print(f''J49: {ws[""J49""].value}'')
print(f''M49: {ws[""M49""].value}'')

print(''\nChecking rows 44-48 for existing formulas:'')
for row in range(44, 49):
    d = ws[f''D{row}''].value
    g = ws[f''G{row}''].value
    j = ws[f''J{row}''].value
    m = ws[f''M{row}''].value
    print(f''Row {row}: D={d}, G={g}, J={j}, M={m}'')
")
